        <api_name>global.OIDC_internal_facebook</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>OIDC_internal script has out of the box implementation of OIDC web SSO request generation, response parsing and validation. In order to support customization customers can override these methods in OIDC_custom Script Include. Below are some methods with their intended functionality.

getRelayStateOptions: 
    this method provides a way to set relay state options to support request generation customizations.

getComputedRequestURI, getComputedRequestQueryString, getComputedBaseURL, setCustomRelayState: 
    These 4 methods are to support relay state generation customizations.</description>
        <name>OIDC_internal_facebook</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");
var OIDC_internal_facebook = Class.create();
OIDC_internal_facebook.prototype = Object.extend(new OIDC_internal(), {
    initialize: function() {
         OIDC_internal.prototype.initialize.call(this);
    },
	
    generateRelayState: function() {
		var serviceUrl = this.ssoRecord.getValue("service_url");
		// As this is OIDC login flow, Setting request type to OIDC.
		var reqType = "OIDC";
		this.logDebug("Generate Nonce:" + true);
        return this.glideoidc.generateRelayStateWithNonce(serviceUrl, reqType, true);
    },
	
	getAuthorizationURL: function() {
		var reqOptions = this.getRelayStateOptions();
		this.glideoidc.setRelayStateOptions(reqOptions);
		var origRelayState = this.generateRelayState();
		var nonce = this.glideoidc.getNonce();
		this.logDebug("Nonce generated for state:" + origRelayState);
		var map = {"state": origRelayState, "nonce": nonce, "response_type": "id_token"};
		return this.oauthClient.getAuthorizationURL(map);
    },
	
	getRelayStateByIdAndValidateNonce: function(stateId, token) {
		return this.glideoidc.getRelayStateByIdAndValidateNonce(stateId, token);
    },
	
    type: 'OIDC_internal_facebook'
});]]></script>
